# Chinese Chess

A Chinese chess program based on `tkintertools` and written in pure Python.

* 🔖 项目版本: `1.8`
* 📦 框架版本: `tkintertools 2.5.9.5`
* ✏️ 项目作者: <https://github.com/Xiaokang2022>
* 🚀 项目存储库: <https://github.com/Xiaokang2022/Chess>
